summary: So the hypervector is just a big vector created from a network:  `"We concatenate features from some or all of the feature maps in the network into one long vector for every location which we call the hypercolumn at that location.
As an example, using pool2 (256 channels), conv4 (384 channels) and fc7 (4096 channels) from the architecture of [28] would lead to a 4736 dimensional vector.
"`  So how exactly do we construct the vector?
